name: remote-operations
description: Coaty example on context-filtered remote operations

scripts.build:prod: coaty-scripts info ./src/app production && ng build --prod && shx echo # Output deployed in dist/ folder
scripts.build:ghpages: coaty-scripts info ./src/app ghpages && ng build -c ghpages --output-path ../../docs/remote-operations --base-href /coaty-examples/remote-operations/ && shx cp .nojekyll ../../docs/remote-operations && shx mkdir ../../docs/remote-operations/control && shx mkdir ../../docs/remote-operations/light && shx cp ../../docs/remote-operations/index.html ../../docs/remote-operations/control && shx cp ../../docs/remote-operations/index.html ../../docs/remote-operations/light && shx echo # Output deployed in ../../docs/remote-operations/ folder
scripts.build:docker: coaty-scripts info ./src/app docker && ng build -c docker && shx echo # Output deployed in dist/ folder

author: Siemens AG
